Introduction
This topic contains information about residuals of cold injury, including
general effects of injury due to cold
long-term effects of exposure to cold
granting SC for residuals of cold injuries
x-ray findings in cold injury cases
considering
circumstances of service in cold injury cases
, and
cold injuries incurred during the Chosin Reservoir Campaign
, and
granting SC for cold injuries incurred during the Chosin Reservoir Campaign
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 5 - Cardiovascular System Conditions
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 5, Section None
